elements.name: merchant When sending a PATCH request to the api/merchant/updatepassword endpoint with valid
elements.description:
authorization and an incorrect old_password in the request body, the response should return a status code of 400,
  and the message in the response body should be "Something went wrong.".

steps.name: The api user sets "api/merchant/updateprofil" path parameters.
The api user prepares a PATCH request containing "Agile" and "Agile.0924" information to send to the api profiledit endpoint.

steps.name: The api user sends a "PATCH" request and saves the returned response.
The api user sends a "PATCH" request, saves the returned response, and verifies that the status code is '400' with the reason phrase Bad Request.

name: As a merchant, I want to be able to update password information via API connection.
